item.title: ‘She’s young enough to be his granddaughter’: My dad, 85, is being seduced by his caregiver. What can I do?
item.description: “He is of sound mind, but he might succumb to someone who offers him companionship.”

item.title: Your tax refund could be $1,000 bigger next year — and even more if you make these money moves in time
item.description: These larger tax refunds would come at a time when many Americans are feeling cost-conscious and priced-out.

item.title: ‘I am increasingly resentful’: My husband of 10 years has $1 million and cars worth $200K. Why won’t he give me money?
item.description: “I maintain the household, walk the dogs and cook regular meals for us both.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
